column4: just installed my wireless how do i get the wlan0 to show up in networking?
just installed my wireless how do i get the wlan0 to show up in networking?
how do you add a connection to network?
wireless
can I get some help here on my wireless please?
what card?
netgearwg111 usb, installed it with ndiswrapper, now how do i get the connection to show up in Network
not sure what your asking... show up where?
wlan0 is the wireless connection, how do i get that to show up in Network Settings? right now only wired connection and modem connection are there
do sudo /etc/init.d/networking restart and see if it shows up then
nope didn't do it :(
change software sources
where is that?
system -> admin -> software sources
i think i know what your asking... you need a dns service
and a registered domain name
how do i make that point to my dns server?
well you need to point the domain name to the serverrs IP address
is there something i can read so I can learn this like online or something?
so i don't have to keep asking you questions
go here: www.easydns.com
ok
